title: Contact Us - FlexPay
summary: This page provides contact information and resources for FlexPay, a company specializing in failed payment recovery and customer churn reduction for subscription businesses. It includes options for sales inquiries, product support, and partnership opportunities, along with a revenue calculator.
key_points: FlexPay offers a revenue and customer recovery calculator.
Contact options are available for Sales, Product Support, and Partnerships/Media.
The page highlights FlexPay's solutions for reducing churn and increasing revenue.
Links to various product, solution, and resource pages are provided.
